A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If not the worst movie in the Star Wars franchise\, then tied for it.  My wife and were both ready to walk out early on.  We stayed for our kids\, one of which wanted to come for his birthday.  They enjoyed it\, so there's that.  They gave it the following ratings: 9 yo: 9/10.  15 yo: 8/10.  16 yo 7/10.  17 yo: 7/10.  Wife and I each gave it a 2.5/10.
